name: Theft Bike Drifting
description:
Theft Bike Drifting

Are you Ready for best theft Bike Drifting Game ? Real addicting mafia game Grab Gang Thief Bike Riding, the new-hit action game is available for IOS now. Do some furious driving with a girl or do some other extreme bike driving !!!   

This games presenting the concept of guard vs thief or protector and thief games with top cop chase thrilling missions. Flexible and comfortable steering wheel and gears through which you can control it easily. Complete the levels and become the new stunt bike hero in a series of demanding challenges!
 
Perform some serious stunts and race to the finish line really fast!  

There are 2 Modes in this game
 1) Survivor mode  
2) Level Mode 

Complete your levels and collect check points to achieve coins targets to upgrade your motorbikes and reach even higher distances for go to next.  

FEATURES

=> User Friendly interface 
=> Collect coins from different stunt area
=> Awesome Breathtaking visuals
 => Smooth and realistic bike handling 
=> Stunning 3D HD quality graphics 
=> Performance of bike 
=> Easy to learn and drive
 => Multiple camera views
=> AI Police cars
